about_the_game:
"Welcome to Knight Fall: Survive Bosses and Claim Victory at the Top! Every move is a challenge as you jump through dangerous lands, battling tough bosses along the way. Be careful; one wrong move could end your journey. Will you beat the horrors or fall to the bosses on your daring quest?

It's as if dark souls and jump king had a baby-

Gameplay:

-True precision platforming!
The path forward is up, and your toughest opponents are the bosses. Each jump is filled with tension; one mistake could mean a long fall, and you'll have to climb back up on your own.

-The longer you hold the further you jump!
It may seem simple, but mastering it will take practice.

-Think before you jump!
The easiest path isn't always the safest, and once you take off, there's no changing course.

-Defeating bosses
There's a boss guarding each world, defeat their minions and the boss to progress.

-Combat
Use your weapon wisely to slice the enemies in your way.

-Leveling
Through slaughering your foes you will earn several points that you can use to level up your character, focus on damage or create unique builds to help your way through the dangeroud worlds.

  • The further you get, the longer the way down
  • All jumps and falls are auto-saved
  • Difficult but addicting gameplay
  • Hours of blood boiling intensity

Atmosphere:

Meet friends, foes and bosses in this unique whimsical world of wonder in your journey to the top.

  • Several whimsical Characters to meet
  • Pixel Graphics mixed with dark fantasy
  • Several unique worlds
  • Several soundtracks for worlds and bosses

Hours of mastering the jump has lead up to this, will you make the jump, will you beat the boss, will you become the FALL KNIGHT?

highlighted.name: Cogmar the Great - Keeper of Grimwood Glade

name: Knight Fall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have any kind of dedicated desktop GPU you should be fine.

short_description: Welcome to Knight Fall, where every move is a challenge! Battle bosses as you climb through dangerous lands. Be careful; a single wrong move could mean the end of the journey. Will you beat the horrors or fall to the bosses on your daring quest?
